author: TheFlyingCorpse
body:
Please add support for SLES 12, the Microsoft friendly Linux distribution.

I have added a ticket with [dotnet-cli](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/6152) to get support for SLES 12, this ticket is for PowerShell once that is underway.

/cc @TravisEz13

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Thanks, @TheFlyingCorpse. Some people have suggested that the package for OpenSUSE 42.2 should work for SLES 12.  This solution is not quite the same thing as support, but I'll try to update this issue if we get unblocked on 42.2

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
I see 
- SLES 12 SP3 EOL - 31 Oct 2027
- SLES 15 EOL - 31 Jul 2031

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @TravisEz13 What is the old issue status? Should we do anything before 7.0 release?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Our policy on SLES is that we test on the equivalent of CentOS.  We don’t test on SLES due to licensing issues.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Add support for SLES 12
